conbody.p: DITA mapsDITA maps are documents that collect references to DITA topics to organize them for output to a specific deliverable, including generating navigation files and links to related topics.

A typical DITA mapDITA map has a title and a set of topicrefs, in a sequence, in a hierarchy, or both, that define the structure by which DITA topics are to be viewed as a complete information deliverable.
